title: My game keeps freezing when im in game
body:
it never happened before my pc has the right system for it but it keeps freezing out of no where now im in leaverbuster

can somebody explain what is happening ( it happened somewhere when i updated my pc not sure its that but just mensioning it){{champion:17}} {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

replies.body: Are you using Windows 10?  A recent update auto-enabled the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) which has been causing freezing issues for some players.  Disabling that should fix up the freezing!  Let me know!
